## Tip :zap:

We can use package manager to manage and use libraries/frameworks.

`npm` can be used for this.
When installing packages to be used with the app with `npm`, use `--save` instead of `--save-dev` parameter. This will specify the package in `package.json` under `dependencies`, not `devDependencies` like what `--save-dev` does, eg:

```
npm i --save jquery moment papaparse
```

There are also a number of other package managers, including:
- [Yarn](https://yarnpkg.com/en/)
- [Bower](https://bower.io/) is another popular one.
- etc.
